about.title: About Creative Studios
about.body: Founded in 2017, Creative Studios has grown from a one-person operation to a full-service digital agency trusted by Fortune 500 companies and innovative startups alike. Our mission is simple: create exceptional digital experiences that drive real business results. With expertise in design, development, and strategy, we're your end-to-end partner for digital transformation.
about.subtitle: Why work with us

items.name: FinTech Dashboard
items.description: Complete redesign and development of a financial analytics platform serving 50K+ users

items.name: E-commerce Rebrand
items.description: Full brand refresh and custom Shopify store for fashion retailer

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.subtitle: Deep dives into our process and results

items.title: How We Increased Conversion by 215%
items.challenge: GrowthCo's landing page had a 2% conversion rate and high bounce rate. They needed a complete redesign to attract enterprise clients.
items.solution: We conducted user research, redesigned the entire user journey, and implemented A/B testing. The new design focused on social proof, clear value propositions, and simplified navigation.

testimonial.text: Creative Studios transformed our digital presence. The results speak for themselves - our pipeline has never been stronger.
testimonial.author: Sarah Johnson
testimonial.title: VP of Marketing, GrowthCo

items.title: Rebranding a Legacy Business for the Digital Age
items.challenge: A 50-year-old furniture company needed to modernize their brand and move their business online without losing their heritage appeal.
items.solution: We developed a brand strategy that honored their history while appealing to modern consumers. Created a new visual identity and a comprehensive e-commerce platform.

testimonial.text: They understood our vision perfectly. The new brand feels fresh but still authentic to who we are.
testimonial.author: Michael Chen
testimonial.title: Owner, Heritage Furniture Co.

items.title: Building a Mobile App from Concept to Launch
items.challenge: First-time founder with an idea for a fitness tracking app needed end-to-end support from concept validation to launch.
items.solution: We guided them through user research, MVP definition, design, development, and go-to-market strategy. Built a native iOS and Android app with backend infrastructure.

testimonial.text: I couldn't have launched without Creative Studios. They were true partners in bringing my vision to life.
testimonial.author: Emily Rodriguez
testimonial.title: Founder, FitTrack Health

items.text: Creative Studios delivered beyond our expectations. They took the time to understand our business, and the website they built has been a game-changer for lead generation. Professional, responsive, and incredibly talented.

items.text: Working with Creative Studios was a pleasure from start to finish. They managed the entire project seamlessly, communicated clearly, and delivered on time. Our new brand identity has positioned us perfectly for growth.
items.author: David Martinez

items.text: I've worked with many agencies over the years, and Creative Studios stands out. Their technical expertise is matched by their creative vision. The app they built is beautiful, fast, and exactly what we needed.

process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: A proven approach to digital success

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: We start by understanding your business, goals, users, and competition through research and stakeholder interviews.

steps.title: Strategy & Planning
steps.description: Define the project scope, create user personas, map user journeys, and establish success metrics.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs. Iterate based on feedback and usability testing.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: Build the solution using modern technologies, best practices, and rigorous quality assurance.

steps.title: Launch & Support
steps.description: Deploy to production, monitor performance, provide training, and offer ongoing support and optimization.

items.question: How long does a typical project take?
items.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope. A simple website takes 2-4 weeks, while custom applications can take 8-16 weeks. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our consultation.

items.question: What's included in your pricing?
items.answer: Our packages include all design and development work, revisions, testing, deployment, and post-launch support. Additional services like ongoing maintenance can be added as needed.

items.question: Do you work with startups?
items.answer: Absolutely! We love working with startups and offer flexible payment plans. Many of our clients are early-stage companies looking to establish their digital presence.

items.question: Can you maintain my existing website?
items.answer: Yes! We offer monthly maintenance packages starting at $500/month. This includes updates, security patches, content changes, and technical support.

items.question: Do you sign NDAs?
items.answer: Yes, we're happy to sign NDAs and confidentiality agreements. We take client privacy and intellectual property protection seriously.

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the work?
items.answer: We offer unlimited revisions within the project scope to ensure you're completely satisfied. Our 100% client satisfaction rate speaks to our commitment to getting it right.

items.question: Do you provide training?
items.answer: Yes! All our packages include training on how to use and maintain your new website or application. We provide documentation and video tutorials as well.

items.question: What technologies do you use?
items.answer: We use modern, proven technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, WordPress, and more. We choose the best stack for each project's specific needs.
